title: Re: Freeware Common lisp compiler?
content:
Subject: Re: Freeware Common lisp compiler?
From: Erik Naggum <erik@naggum.no>
Date: 2000/02/28
Newsgroups: comp.lang.lisp
Message-ID: <3160705543379547@naggum.no>

* Marek Mikulec <mm98au@badger.ac.brocku.ca>
| I'm looking for a freeware common lisp compiler (preferably Windows
| based). Is there such a thing anyware? I just need it to do a couple of
| assignments for uni, nothing spectacular.

  start at www.lisp.org and look around.

  I'd recommend getting Franz Inc's free version of Allegro CL for
  Windows.  start at www.franz.com and look for "free stuff".

#:Erik
author: Erik Naggum
